item.title: Autodesk Software Installation Guide
item.description: Introduction Autodesk is a leading force in the design and BIM industries, widely recognised for its extensive range of software solutions and large global user base.

item.title: Dynamo Calculation Python Codes
item.description: Python script for random panels Full script (copy to dynamo) data = IN[0] true_type = IN[1] false_type = IN[2] key = IN[3] results = [x > key for x in data] types = [true_type if result else false_type for result in results] OUT = types Script explained 1.

item.title: Revizto Platform
item.description: Revizto is a cloud-based BIM coordination tool that integrates models, drawings, and issue tracking in one platform.

item.title: Unity Engine Installation Guide
item.description: Unity is a real-time 3D platform that enhances BIM with interactive visualisation, VR/AR experiences, and real-time rendering.

item.title: Welcome to OENG1191
item.description: Week 9-12 Unity Please install the following: Refer to Unity Engine to install Unity Hub and Unity.
